text: Dmitry Andreyevich Muratov (, born 30 October 1961) is a Russian journalist. He is the editor-in-chief of the Russian newspaper Novaya Gazeta. He edited the newspaper between 1995 and 2017. He won the 2021 Nobel Peace Prize with Maria Ressa.https://archive.today/20211008090154/https://www.nobelprize.org/prizes/peace/2021/summary/ He is known for criticizing President Vladimir Putin and his government on human rights abuses. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Russian journalists Category:Russian television presenters
title: Dmitry Muratov
